meanings.definition: Any of a class of organic compounds containing a five-membered ring with three carbon atoms and two nitrogen atoms.
meanings.sent1: I learned about azole in my chemistry class.
meanings.sent2: The scientist synthesized a new azole compound for the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The azole molecules were having a party in the test tube.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of azole was as sharp as a diamond.
meanings.sent5: The structure of azole was as clear as a sunny day.

meanings.definition: A compound containing an azole ring.
meanings.sent1: The medication he prescribed contained azole for treating the infection.
meanings.sent2: She studied the properties of the azole compound under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The azole ring in the chemical formula looked like a tiny crown.
meanings.sent4: The importance of azole in the pharmaceutical industry cannot be overstated.
meanings.sent5: The azole ring sparkled like a precious gem under the light.
